title: E9 The Wandering Cowboy and the Pregnancy Pact, but for Boys
description: In episode 9, Em tells Christine about the Sallie House, botched surgeries, hoofprints, Gateway to Hell and all. Meanwhile, Christine tells the story of the indestructible Michael Malloy, which includes a lot of drinking, snapping, and rat poison. Basically, this episode is a spin-off of Newsies. And that’s why we drink!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
